name: Limit on contributions from nonresident individuals and persons
text: Contributions from all persons, except for a member of the candidate's immediate family, who are not residents of the State at the time the contributions are made, including a noncandidate committee organized under the laws of another state and whose participants are not residents of the State, shall not exceed twenty per cent of the total contributions received by a candidate or candidate's committee for each reporting period. [L 2005, c 203, pt of §1; am L 2007, c 200, §6]
